content: सेवा [सेव्-अ] {@--1@} Service, servitude, dependence; attendance; सेवां लाघवकारिणीं कृतधियः स्थाने श्ववृत्तिं विदुः <ls>Mu. 3. 14</ls>; हनिसेवा न कर्तव्या <ls>H. 3. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Worship, homage, honouring {@--3@} Addiction or devotion to, fondness for. {@--4@} Use, practice, employment, exercise. {@--5@} Frequenting, resorting to. {@--6@} Flattery, coaxing or flattering words; अलं सेवया मध्यस्थतां गृहीत्वा भण <ls>M. 3.</ls>
